funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.com

Class BluetoothJava

  • java.lang.Object
    • funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.com.BluetoothJava
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bluetooth, javax.bluetooth.DiscoveryListener

    public class BluetoothJava
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.bluetooth.DiscoveryListener, Bluetooth
    Class for Bluetooth Serial Communication (Standard Serial COM over Bluetooth) Accepting connections and managing connections are handled in separate threads to prevent any blocking of the main thread.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface javax.bluetooth.DiscoveryListener
